name: TPS (POMAH)
description:
Control (You can watch while playing at "K")

  • Left Mouse - Fire
  • Right Mouse- Aim
  • R - Reload
  • F - Interact
  • G - Throw Grenade
  • X - Skill
  • 1 - Primary Weapon
  • 2 - Secondary Weapon
  • 3 - Knife
  • W,A,S,D - Movement 
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • C - Roll
  • Left Ctrl -Crouch
  • Left Alt - Walk
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Enter - Chat
  • Y - General Chat
  • U - Team Chat
  • Tab - Show Score Screen
  • ESC/6 - Setting Menu
